info.author: Brian Jaress
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
Jest is a software project estimator.
        You use it to predict how much time and how many people it will take
        to create a piece of software.

        Notable features:

        * Gives you a decent estimate from a small amount of input
        * Gives you a better estimate with more detailed input
        * Runs from the command line
        * Easy to use (if you're comfortable with the command line)
        * Free Software

        Jest is designed to be a free, simple, *nix-style alternative to
        complicated proprietary estimators.
info.name: jest
info.summary: Estimates time and people for software projects
info.html_description:
Jest is a software project estimator.
You use it to predict how much time and how many people it will take
to create a piece of software.

Notable features:

* Gives you a decent estimate from a small amount of input
* Gives you a better estimate with more detailed input
* Runs from the command line
* Easy to use (if you're comfortable with the command line)
* Free Software

Jest is designed to be a free, simple, *nix-style alternative to
complicated proprietary estimators.
